cookingTips: Cut cold butter into small dice before mixing so it creates texture when baked
Use a fork or pastry cutter to combine ingredients until mixture resembles coarse breadcrumbs
Distribute topping evenly over pie filling, leaving some bare spots for heat to penetrate the filling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on creating a coarse, crumbly texture by cutting in cold butter properly so the topping stays crispy rather than becoming dense.
